personal.name: Muhammad Aziz Rahman
personal.about: Muhammad Aziz Rahman, a highly motivated and detail-oriented physics undergraduate from University of Indonesia, I have a strong passion for geospatial analysis, machine learning, and computer vision. With my current position as a Data Engineer at PT Aptaworks, I have honed my skills in Python programming, data pipelines, and machine learning. My experience working on data-driven projects (especially in Supply Chain Management) and solid academic background have given me a strong foundation in analytical thinking and problem-solving. Committed to staying up-to-date with the latest advancements in the field, I strive to consistently deliver high-quality work.

programming_languages: Python (Pandas, Airflow, Prefect Dataflow, Numpy, Manim, Regex, Scikit-Learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Pytorch, OpenCV, Selenium, BeautifulSoup, Django)
tools: AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Sagemaker, Lambda, Glue, DMS, KMS)
certifications: Microsoft Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals

experience.title: IT Solution Track&Trace
experience.description: Working as dedicated Software Developer and Validation Engineer for Philip Morris International through PT Aptaworks to support the Track & Trace division.
achievements: Built automation infrastructure for exception reporting using Python and Prefect Data Flow for the IT Track&Trace Division
Improving security and front-end various CRM apps using ASP.NET framework
Provide vulnerability remediation for every cloud and on-premise instance
Provide support for the operational and business team to handle daily tasks by creating Python scripts
Provide support for the operational Track and Trace team to handle tickets for migrating databases using AWS Data Migration Service
Communicate with stakeholders across Philip Morris International affiliate to develop application documentation related to European Tobacco Products Directive (EUTPD) revision
Managing and migrating secrets credential of IT Track&Trace Division to Hashicorp Vault
Configuring and managing AWS cloud computing environment of IT Track&Trace Division

experience.title: Mathematical Animator
experience.description: Working as part-time mathematical animator creating animation for BlockChain courses using Manim.

experience.title: Data Engineer
achievements: Constructed an optimization algorithm for the weekly cigarette production using Python and Streamlit
Developed a data pipeline and generated weekly/daily reports for the Material Readiness Project
Created a data pipeline and generated weekly dashboard reports for the Inventory Projection Project
Produced and distributed weekly dashboard reports of the Synchronization Hub PDCA
Successfully migrated Power BI dataflow from Redshift (AWS) to Snowflake DB
Created remote sensing application to quantify vegetation greenness from satellite imagery
Built a face recognition model for an attendance system using OpenCV, PyTorch, and Fast.ai
